strategy_reasoning: Combining technical updates (SSE video support, backend optimization) into a cozy narrative about 'streamlining' the digital garden. Using the pixel art style to make backend fixes feel satisfying and tangible, like organizing a room.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art close-up of a retro CRT monitor sitting on a wooden desk surrounded by plants. On the screen, a loading bar is full and glowing lime green (#ecf874). A tiny pixel bee mascot sits on top of the monitor looking happy. Soft pastel lavender and peach gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font on screen: 'Smoother Streams'. Nostalgic, peaceful.
images.description: Visualizing the SSE support for video models as a smooth, completed loading experience on a retro screen.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot connecting a glowing lime green (#ecf874) cable into a retro server machine that looks like a garden planter. Data particles flowing smoothly like water through the cable. Soft mint and cream background. Chunky retro sprites, warm hug energy. Text in pixel font: 'Video Upgrades'.
images.description: Representing the api.airforce video model fixes as physical infrastructure work in a cozy garden lab.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art of a tidy workspace. The pixel bee is holding a clipboard next to a chart showing an arrow going up. The room is clean and organized, symbolizing the optimized Tinybird queries and fixed KPIs. Lime green (#ecf874) glow from the window. Atmospheric dust motes, calm vibes like Unpacking game. Text in pixel font: 'Tidying Up'.
images.description: Visualizing the backend optimizations and churn fixes as a satisfying 'spring cleaning' moment.

caption:

alt_text: A carousel of cozy pixel art images featuring a cute bee mascot. 1. A retro monitor with a lime green loading bar. 2. The bee connecting cables in a garden server room. 3. The bee organizing a tidy workspace. All in soft pastels and 8-bit style.
